result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مِّن رِّجۡزٍ أَلِيمٞ
result.translation: (5) But those who strive against Our verses [seeking] to cause failure[1219] - for them will be a painful punishment of foul nature.
result.footnotes: [1219]- i.e., to undermine their credibility in order to defeat the Prophet (ﷺ).
